description.narrative: HR has provided strategic support in the definition of the structure for the 2020-2025 CPMP, supported implementation of the Pulse survey response plan, technically lead the office ethics weeks, ensured timely recruitment of new talents and supported staff capacity-building and career development. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020
